function.description: Convert a page from a PDF file to SVG using Inkscape CLI.
function.name: media.convert_pdf_to_svg

output_path.description: Path for the output SVG file. Defaults to the input path with a .svg extension.

page.description: 1-based page number to convert. Defaults to 1 (first page).

pdf_path.description: Path to the input PDF file.
